title: Strategic IT Consulting
intro: End-to-end strategy and execution for complex technology portfolios with multi-year, multimillion-dollar impacts.

items.title: Technology Roadmapping
items.body: Develop multi-year technology strategies aligned with organizational goals, risk posture, and budget constraints.

items.title: Portfolio Assessment
items.body: Evaluate current systems, identify gaps, and recommend modernization or replacement strategies.

items.title: Implementation Planning
items.body: Detailed execution plans with governance, timelines, resource allocation, and success metrics.
